---------------------------------------------------------------------
"Stephen King at his finest...a dazzling novel."?Nicholas Sparks

----

Lisey Debusher Landon lost her husband Scott two years ago, after a 
twenty-five year marriage of the most profound and sometimes frightening 
intimacy. Scott was an award-winning, bestselling novelist and a very 
complicated man. Early in their relationship, before they married, Lisey had to 
learn from him about books and blood and bools. Later, she understood that 
there was a place Scott went?a place that both terrified and healed him, 
could eat him alive or give him the ideas he needed in order to live. Now it&#039;s 
Lisey&#039;s turn to face Scott&#039;s demons. Lisey&#039;s turn to go to Boo&#039;ya Moon. What 
begins as a widow&#039;s effort to sort through the papers of her celebrated 
husband becomes a nearly fatal journey into the darkness he inhabited. 
Perhaps King&#039;s most personal and powerful story ever, Lisey&#039;s Story is about 
the wellsprings of creativity, the temptations of madness, and the secret 
language of love.

----

"In Lisey&#039;s Story, Stephen King makes bold, brilliant use of his satanic 
storytelling gift, his angelic ear for language, and above all his incomparable 
ability to find the epic in the ordinary...."?Michael Chabon

----

ABOUT THE AUTHOR

Stephen King has written more than forty novels and two hundred short 
stories. He is the recipient of the 2003 National Book Foundation Medal for 
Distinguished Contribution to American Letters. King has also received the O. 
Henry Award for his story "The Man in the Black Suit," and he is the editor of 
The Best American Short Stories 2006. Among his most recent worldwide 
bestsellers are Cell, The Dark Tower series, On Writing, The Green Mile and 
Bag of Bones. He lives in Bangor, Maine, with his wife, novelist Tabitha King.

----

ABOUT THE READER

Mare Winningham has appeared in more than fifty film and television 
projects, garnering an Academy Award nomination for Georgia and Emmy 
Awards for the telefilms George Wallace and Amber Waves. She is also an 
accomplished singer-songwriter.
